writer.name: 保罗·内戈埃斯库 Paul Negoescu

director.name: 保罗·内戈埃斯库 Paul Negoescu

introduction: A short film about an interview for line errors Forbidden Minors under 16 without parental consent!Introducing the infamous short film "Hot Line" which is how I make a casting for erotic line, the script made some initially distributed film actors to abandon the project. Directed by Paul Negoescu double nominated for the European Film Academy and three times nominated for the Golden Bear.
